dev.jeka.core.api.depmanagement

Interface JkArtifactProducer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JkArtifactLocator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JkStandardFileArtifactProducer, JkSuppliedFileArtifactProducer

    public interface JkArtifactProducer
extends JkArtifactLocator
    Interface to be implemented by classes responsible of producing artifacts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  JkArtifactProducer.JkSupplier

    • Method Detail

      • makeArtifact

        void makeArtifact(JkArtifactId jkArtifactId)
        Produces the specified artifact file. This method is supposed to create it from scratch (should be working after a clean) but implementations can caches already processed phase result as compilation result or so.

      • makeArtifacts

        default void makeArtifacts(java.lang.Iterable<JkArtifactId> artifactFileIds)
        Produces all the artifact files for the specified artifact file ids.

        default void makeAllArtifacts()

        default void makeMainArtifact()

      • makeMissingArtifacts

        default void makeMissingArtifacts(JkArtifactId... artifactFileIds)
        Produces specified artifact files. Only non existing files are created.

      • makeMissingArtifacts

        default void makeMissingArtifacts(java.lang.Iterable<JkArtifactId> artifactFileIds)
        Same as makeArtifact(JkArtifactId)
